page.title: 02Llangunllo Population
page.content: In the block covered there are about 50 houses and farms with a total population of about 114 people. Seven more houses in the village are used as seasonal homes. The primary school in the village closed last year since its roll had dropped below 10 and there were few children under the age of five. Ten houses have been sold in the last two years but of the incoming families, only two have children of school age and one of these families sends their children away to school. It is obviously a time of transition in the village and it remains to be seen whether Llangunllo can assimilate so large an influx of incomers without losing its essential character.
